thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 13 of 187
thread.title: Joanna Bowen-Jones

author: Joanna Bowen-Jones
title: Joanna Bowen-Jones
text:
I was amazed how easy the whole process was. I had seven quick responses and made contact with my chosen house sitter regularly before her arrival and she kept in regular contact while I was away. My dog bonded with her straight away and sulked when she left. Great news she is coming back!
I have recommended THS to several people and others have asked me for details.
Happy dog, happy house, happy me.
